ygData.subject: Re: We've been had!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it turns out that The Mark was not as big of a bunch of idiotic freakish morons as I thought. That idiotic pathetic excuse for a human being Lindell
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it turns out that The Mark was not as big of a bunch of idiotic
freakish morons as I thought. That idiotic pathetic excuse for a human
being Lindell really was on the tinkering list all along. The freak said (at
least he said) that he was leading me along all along. He's probably just
some pathetic kid starved for attention. He knows nothing, I bet, he must
just be a sad abused person in need of mental help dearly. There was no Mark
I bet, like I said, that little whelp that doesn't even deserve the breath
that he breaths is just a big evil liar. Sorry guys.
It seems we can almost trust no one on the list now.


>If there was a third book, it would seem logical that it would have
>recipies for things in it other than a collapsable fishing pole. So why
>aren't we seeing more tinkered items besides this pole come out of that
>book? Unless all the other formulas in it are broken.
>
>I suspect this is a wild goose chase, and someone, somewhere is having a
>good laugh at our expense.
>
>Rotgut
